page.title: 10A Day In The Life Of.
page.content: {Rufforth Village Shopkeeper's Day. He gets up at{04.30}to deliver milk. Then he opens letters and goes to cash and carry.Then he works in the shop and when the shop closes he does his accounts and watches television and goes to bed. {Schoolboy James At Rufforth. } First he dresses and has breakfast and cleans his teeth. Then he takes the dog for a walk and comes to School where we have radio assembly and{R.E.} After play he has{Recorders.}Then half the class has{P.E.}and the other half has{Music}.Then he has dinner followed by{Art and Craft}and{Maths.} {The Rufforth Vicar's Day. } He has morning prayers.Then he goes in the study for preparation and organization and in the afternoon he visits the sick and goes to meetings. { }
